entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
